review: Vancocin (vancomycin):The IV antibiotic given via PICC line is causing me to have Thrush mouth. I take Rocefin once a day and Vactomycin every 12 hours. I am feeling better but I am dealing with a lot of indigestion and sour stomach. I was told by my physician that I will be taking this treatment for one month.

This drug saved my life back in January of 2012. I was on it for 30 days at 2  IV solutions a day to clear me up. Iâ€™m currently on it again  for the same condition. I have never experienced any side effects and was/am pleased and very thankful for its results as the drug is saving my life again at this very moment that I type this while admitted to the hospital. I have nothing negative to say about the results of this drug
